item.title: Recruitment
item.description:
I'm announcing that we are recruiting volunteers that want be part of the Clanzone's Staff!

At the moment we are especially searching staff for:

-news team:
-support team

If you are interested in apply for these jobs or any other you have to:

1) register

2) give a look at the job list and descriptions Here.

3) enter the Forum and go in the Application Board section

4) read the Application Template copy the Single Application code

5) go back in the application board section and click on "New Topic"

6) paste here the code and write your own application (dont forget to write a title!)

7) all done, good job! Now you'll have to give us some time for read your application and start the acceptance processes.

We wish you good luck and thanks you for your time.

Best regards,

Prozac

P.S. You can see our current staff Here
item.author: anpedri88@fastwebnet.it (Andrea )

item.title: Database update
item.description:
Hello

We are updating the clan database.
If you want to have your clan mentioned in our database, please register yourself here and write an introduction for your clan in the forum.
Afterwards, we will ask for your clan logo and use it for our database. The logo will be used if we are announcing your clanwar, posting results of your wars, writing news about your clan (hopefully we will get the news directly from you )and so on.

Benefit from our service by just showing activity here.

REGISTER NOW
item.author: maestral1@hotmail.com (Emir )
